pages.text: The $(item)Chisel Table$() is used to make many decorative blocks, making such blocks require a $(thing)base material$() item, $(thing)dye$() items and a $(thing)Template$() item (not consumed in the crafting process).$(br2)The table itself is a multiblock structure requiring two blocks.

pages.name: Chisel Table Multiblock
pages.text: Using the $(item)Brush and Inkstone$() opens the crafting GUI.

pages.title: Templates
pages.text: Process $(item)Polished Blackstone$() with stonecutter to acquire $(thing)templates$().

pages.title: Dye and Dye Powder
pages.text: $(item)Dye Powder$() is a smaller portion of dye, used in crafting.

pages.title: Some Examples
pages.text: Here are some block that can be crafted with $(item)Chisel Table$(). Recipes can be looked up in JEI.
